titleStmt.title: Second sermon preach'd before the King and Queen and Queen Dowager in Their Majesties chappel at St. James's upon All-Saints Day, November 1, 1685 by ... Ph. Ellis, monk of the holy order of S. Benedict and of the English Congr.
titleStmt.author: Ellis, Philip, 1652-1726.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
